DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double-blind , placebo control Phase II study design assess safety efficacy use JVS-100 treat heart failure .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy JVS-100 Administered Adults With Ischemic Heart Failure .
DOC.detailed_description: 90 subject ischemic cardiomyopathy randomize receive single dose 15 30 mg JVS-100 matching placebo . Subjects randomize 1:1:1 receive either placebo , 15 mg 30 mg JVS-100 . Subjects monitor overnight 18-24 hour post dose schedule visit 3 day post-injection safety evaluation . All subject schedule follow-up visit approximately 30 day ( 1 month ) , 120 day ( 4 month ) , 360 day ( 12 month ) assess safety cardiac function .
